Subskills.name: Stoned Mind
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of tectonic boulder.

Subskills.name: Tiny Stones
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple smaller boulders in an arc.

Subskills.name: Boulder Momentum
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of tectonic boulder.

Subskills.name: Stone Density
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by tectonic boulder.

Subskills.name: Fractured Balance
Subskills.description: Knock monsters back on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Crushing Boulder
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Chunky Stone
Subskills.description: Increases the size of tectonic boulder.

Subskills.name: Stone Slinger
Subskills.description: Throw boulders with increased projectile speed causing them to bounce off terrain.

Subskills.name: Frosted Pebble
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash a frozen boulder inflicting freezing on hit.

Subskills.name: Frostbiting Boulder
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frozen targets.

Subskills.name: Fragmentation
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Colossal Boulder
Subskills.description: Unleash a boulder with increased size and damage stunning monsters on hit. Tectonic boulder now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Molten Boulder
Subskills.description: Conjure a molten boulder leaving behind a trail of lava inflicting monsters with burning on hit.
